supportLoginMessage: Click here if you're having trouble logging in.
supportConvertingMessage: Click here if you're having trouble converting.
bindingsSelectKey: Press a key combination to bind.
bindingsLockAltitude: Toggles altitude lock, preventing up/down movement
bindingsGizmoTranslate: Sets the gizmo to translation mode, allowing you to move objects.
bindingsGizmoRotate: Sets the gizmo to rotation mode, allowing you to rotate objects.
bindingsGizmoScale: Sets the gizmo to scaling mode, allowing you to resize objects.
bindingsGizmoLocalSpace: Toggles the gizmo's operational coordinate system between local coordinates and world coordinates.
bindingsFullscreen: Toggles between fullscreen and windowed modes.
bindingsAddUDS: Opens the dialog box to add a UDS model to the scene.
bindingsRemove: Deletes all selected items from the scene.
bindingsCameraLeft: Key to move camera to the left.
bindingsCameraRight: Key to move camera to the right.
bindingsDecreaseCameraSpeed: Key to set cameras speed to 0.1x
bindingsIncreaseCameraSpeed: Key to set cameras speed to 10x
bindingsCancel: Key to trigger cancel or close action.
bindingsRenameSceneItem: Key to rename selected scene item.
bindingsLoad: Key to trigger load or open action.
bindingsToggleSelectTool: Key to toggle the selection tool
bindingsToggleMeasureLineTool: Key to toggle the line measurement tool
bindingsToggleMeasureAreaTool: Key to toggle the area measurement tool
bindingsToggleAnnotateTool: Key to toggle the annotation tool
bindingsToggleInspectionTool: Key to toggle the inspection tool
bindingsOpenSettingsMenu: Key to open the settings menu
bindingsToggleMeasureHeightTool: Key to toggle the vertical measurement tool
bindingsAddSimpleCrossSection: Key to add a new cross section filter
bindingsAddCrossSection: Key to add a section view
bindingsAddViewShed: Key to add a viewshed to the scene
bindingsAddMedia: Key to add a media item to the scene
bindingsAddPolygonFilter: Key to add a polygon filter to the scene
bindingsAddMapTiles: Key to add a map tile to the scene
annotationsZoneMessage: Given coordinates are intepreted to be in coordinate system {0} ({1}: {2})
RieglCameraOffsetTooltip:
For Riegl MLS scans, you may want to shift the
photospheres relative to the vehicle. For example,
they may appear to high relative to where the
points were captured (the lidar scanner).
In this case you may want to lower the photospheres
to align them better to the point cloud in the scene.

Use the Riegl vehicle coordinate system:
   x: is the direction of the vehicle
   y: is to the right
   z: is down
RieglSmoothPhotospheresTooltip:
This option attempts to counteract the 'bounce' of
the vehicle in order to steady the photospheres.
annotationsFolderSelectionPromptToolTip:
Set the folder for any images associated with the CSV, or leave as
'Same folder as CSV' if unsure.
